titles.title: A resolution celebrating the tenth anniversary of the Women's Congressional Staff Association.
A resolution celebrating the tenth anniversary of the Women's Congressional Staff Association.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: Celebrates the 10th anniversary of the founding of the Women's Congressional Staff Association (the first official staff association focused on the professional development of female staffers).
